response.overview: Music video for the track "Waiting" by REKLAMA, a Boston-based indie band. Off of their 5-song Who Swallowed Who EP, out everywhere on streaming 5/12/23 from Light of Day Records as well as on cassette tape. People often talk about the necessity of militantly advocating for yourself within the American healthcare system. Especially if your body relies on this system to get medications and medical supplies that you need daily to survive. What we don't talk about enough is- how do you advocate for yourself staying alive when you no longer wish to live?
response.title: “Waiting” by REKLAMA
